about_the_game:
Step inside the circle of extraordinary music interpretations


What happens when two composers meet and unleash their creativity? A sound feast of music! Dive into an extraordinary collaboration of Piotr Musiał - the creator of Frostpunk Soundtrack - and Ed Critchley, who has made the ethereal music to South of the Circle game. The EP Circles album contains two covers of each composer's music re-arranged by the other, thus blending the feel of the original mood with the new sensibility.

This package includes:

  • 2 tracks from Frostpunk OST in versions by Ed Critchley
  • 2 tracks from South of the Circle OST in versions by Piotr Musiał
  • 3 exclusive digital postcards (postcards differ between versions. Check South of the Circle version)
All of them in popular formats: wav, flac and mp3.
Upon downloading the files will be placed in the following folder:
...Steam/steamapps/music/Circles EP Frostpunk Edition



Piotr Musiał is a renowned Polish music game composer, who in the past worked on such titles as This War of Mine, The Witcher 3: Blood and Wine, Bulletstorm, Frostpunk and more.

Ed Critchley is a UK-based composer for Bafta award-winning State of Play Games, and remixes for bands such as Archive & Floex.
detailed_description:
UPCOMING GAMES





About the Game

Step inside the circle of extraordinary music interpretations


What happens when two composers meet and unleash their creativity? A sound feast of music! Dive into an extraordinary collaboration of Piotr Musiał - the creator of Frostpunk Soundtrack - and Ed Critchley, who has made the ethereal music to South of the Circle game. The EP Circles album contains two covers of each composer's music re-arranged by the other, thus blending the feel of the original mood with the new sensibility.

All of them in popular formats: wav, flac and mp3.
Upon downloading the files will be placed in the following folder:
...Steam/steamapps/music/Circles EP Frostpunk Edition



Piotr Musiał is a renowned Polish music game composer, who in the past worked on such titles as This War of Mine, The Witcher 3: Blood and Wine, Bulletstorm, Frostpunk and more.

Ed Critchley is a UK-based composer for Bafta award-winning State of Play Games, and remixes for bands such as Archive & Floex.

short_description: What happens when two composers meet and unleash their creativity? A sound feast of music! Dive into the EP Circles - a collaboration of Piotr Musiał, the creator of Frostpunk OST, and Ed Critchley, who has made the music to South of the Circle game.
